camera.note_0: Modify useDOF to turn on/off the depth of field effect. focusDistance & apertureRadius can be adjusted for different blurring effects

scene.note_1: To set the environment map, either specify the enviornment map path from ../models/envoMaps/{envo.png} or specify the color you want to use like [0.235294, 0.67451, 0.843137]
scene.note_2: If you set model_quality to high, you will use meshes with more faces. In general, using low quality is sufficient to stay within the 4 hour rendering time limit.
scene.note_3: material options are: rough_red_conductor, rough_white_conductor, green_mirror, gold_conductor, silver_mirror, smooth_glass, smooth_glass_gem, clear_rough_plastic, rough_plastic.
scene.note_4: setting texture to true will render the chessboard. setting to false will lead to a patternless floor
scene.note_5: set to true if you would like to see the diamond in the final scene for gem-like refraction display
